name: YouTube "Hitchhiker" 2013 Dark [CENTERED] (DEAD)
description:
Unfortunately I do not have the time to update this theme. Feel free to reuse, modify, redistribute, or do whatever you want with my code. I apologize to those who I kept waiting. Based off of style 79549 by user 169095!

A dark version of the new YouTube. Uses a modified version of user 169095's "Centered YouTube user style - please make sure you disable his if you use this one! As an added bonus, the dislike bar is red again! Enjoy a a dark, centered YouTube once and for all! Don't forget to thank user 169095 for making YouTube centered!
